ValidationRule.description: Identifies situations where "5500 Situation" doesn't match data entered in Prior Year & Final 5500 Sections 2 of 2
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordTypeId = '01237000000N0lp' && ISPICKVAL(X5500_Situation__c, 'Final 5500 Only') && ( NOT(ISBLANK( Plan_Year_End__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK( Form_Year__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK( ASC_URL_Link__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK( Due_Date__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Situation = Final 5500 Only but data is entered in the "Prior Year 5500" section - Either "Situation" or data in Prior 5500 section needs to be corrected.
